Title: IMS Health Holdings Inc. (IMS) Has Begun Trading - IPO Alert
Description: IMS Health Holdings Inc. (IMS: Quote) has started trading for the first time Friday morning. The company priced its initial public offering of 65,000,000 shares at $20 per share. IMS Health Holdings is now up 2.21 at $22.21 on 7 million shares.

Title: B&G Foods Inc. (BGS) Is Up Following Acquisition
Description: B&G Foods Inc. (BGS: Quote) announced after the bell Thursday that it has agreed to acquire Specialty Brands of America Inc. and related entities from affiliates of American Capital Ltd. and certain individuals for approximately $155 million in cash.
